thread.title: Great location, comfortable stay
thread.title_full: Great location, comfortable stay - Review of Pod 39 Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: cloid
title: Great location, comfortable stay
text:
I stayed for one night while passing through NYC to Connecticut.
All comfortable and good service. Stayed in Queen-sized room. Not much storage space which would be an issue if staying longer than couple of nights.
Location is perfect and able to leave luggage while I spent day in NYC.
Watch out for local taxes. I ended up paying almost double my Quote: on booking.com
Room Tip: Higher floors are quieter See more room tips
